00071 class OPENMM_EXPORT CustomAngleForce : public Force {
00072 public:
00079     explicit CustomAngleForce(const std::string& energy);
00083     int getNumAngles() const {
00084         return angles.size();
00085     }
00089     int getNumPerAngleParameters() const {
00090         return parameters.size();
00091     }
00095     int getNumGlobalParameters() const {
00096         return globalParameters.size();
00097     }
00101     const std::string& getEnergyFunction() const;
00105     void setEnergyFunction(const std::string& energy);
00112     int addPerAngleParameter(const std::string& name);
00119     const std::string& getPerAngleParameterName(int index) const;
00126     void setPerAngleParameterName(int index, const std::string& name);
00134     int addGlobalParameter(const std::string& name, double defaultValue);
00141     const std::string& getGlobalParameterName(int index) const;
00148     void setGlobalParameterName(int index, const std::string& name);
00155     double getGlobalParameterDefaultValue(int index) const;
00162     void setGlobalParameterDefaultValue(int index, double defaultValue);
00172     int addAngle(int particle1, int particle2, int particle3, const std::vector<double>& parameters);
00182     void getAngleParameters(int index, int& particle1, int& particle2, int& particle3, std::vector<double>& parameters) const;
00192     void setAngleParameters(int index, int particle1, int particle2, int particle3, const std::vector<double>& parameters);
00193 protected:
00194     ForceImpl* createImpl();
00195 private:
00196     class AngleInfo;
00197     class AngleParameterInfo;
00198     class GlobalParameterInfo;
00199     std::string energyExpression;
00200     std::vector<AngleParameterInfo> parameters;
00201     std::vector<GlobalParameterInfo> globalParameters;
00202     std::vector<AngleInfo> angles;
00203 };

00210 public:

00212     std::vector<double> parameters;

00214     }

00217     }
